name: canto
description: node.js and browser JavaScript library with easy to use API to load a TypeScript projects from git repositories, ready to be used by Compiler API, with full LanguageService and TypeChecker, read/write support.

scripts.lint: npm run organizeImports && npm run format
scripts.all-publish: npm run all && git commit -a -m "version patch" && npm version patch && npm publish
scripts.all: npm run clean && npm run lint && npm run build && npm run test

author: Sebasti√°n Gurin
